items.sentence: Tom couldn't believe Mary didn't know how to do that.
Tom doesn't have as many pairs of shoes as Mary does.
Since it's so important, I'll take care of it myself.
Tom just finished reading the book that you lent him.
After a few seconds' pause, we started talking again.
If it weren't for water, there'd be no life on Earth.
I looked around and saw that most of us were limping.
I don't like work even when someone else is doing it.
Why don't we ask Tom if he knows how to speak French?
One man's terrorist is another man's freedom fighter.
